slides.subtitle: SEO & Google Ads
slides.titleHtml:
More visibility on Google
campaigns that convert

seo.title: Google SEO | Technical Optimization and Google Ads
seo.description: Improve organic visibility with technical and content SEO. Run effective Google Ads campaigns with tracking and continuous optimization.

whatWeDo.subtitle: How We Work
whatWeDo.title: Audit, plan and execution
whatWeDo.text: We audit your site, prioritize quick wins and mid-term plan. We set up campaigns with clear tracking and optimize for ROI.

pricingSection.subtitle: Plans
pricingSection.title: Options for your strategy: SEO and Google Ads
pricingSection.description: Improve your visibility on search engines (SEO) and attract customers today with Google Ads.

plans.name: Basic SEO
plans.description: Ideal to start showing up on Google with essential on-site improvements.
features: Clear titles and descriptions for Google

plans.name: SEO + Google Ads
plans.description: Combine SEO improvements with Google Ads for visible results in a short time.

plans.name: Advanced SEO + Google Ads
plans.description: For companies looking to scale with advanced strategies, automation and constant testing.
features: A/B testing for ads and pages

items.a: It depends on your baseline. Improvements are common in 2–3 months; consolidation in 6+ months.

items.q: How do you define SEM budget?
items.a: Based on goals, market and estimated CPC. We suggest a starting budget to validate performance.
Rankings, organic traffic, CTR, conversions and cost per acquisition among other key KPIs.
